articles.title: Blockbuster musical Hamilton to head to Melbourne after a year in Sydney - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The Australian cast of Lin-Manuel Miranda’s genre-bending hip hop tale of the American Revolution will call Her Majesty’s Theatre home from as early as March.
articles.content:
A Melbourne season was expected to be officially announced by the end of the month and will likely result in a scramble for tickets in both cities.
